name: rinawarp-email-qa-suite
description: Comprehensive email quality assurance testing suite for RinaWarp email campaigns

scripts.test:links: node -e "const QA = require('./email-qa-suite.js'); const qa = new QA(); qa.verifyLinks();"
scripts.test:personalization: node -e "const QA = require('./email-qa-suite.js'); const qa = new QA(); qa.testPersonalization();"
scripts.test:spam: node -e "const QA = require('./email-qa-suite.js'); const qa = new QA(); qa.testSpamScore();"
scripts.test:responsive: node -e "const QA = require('./email-qa-suite.js'); const qa = new QA(); qa.testResponsiveDesign();"
scripts.test:attachments: node -e "const QA = require('./email-qa-suite.js'); const qa = new QA(); qa.verifyAttachmentSizes();"
scripts.install-deps: npm install axios cheerio puppeteer nodemailer

author: RinaWarp Technologies
